articles.title: EU races to shield industry as Russia gas stoppage shakes markets - Reuters
articles.description: European gas prices surged, stocks slid and the euro sank on Monday after Russia halted gas flows via a major pipeline, sending another shock wave through economies in the region still struggling to recover from the pandemic.
